Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment

Place Magic: Cast spell w/out preparation when in Rashemen
Protective Touch: Touched gains +4 on next save w/in 1 hour 1/dy
School Opposition (Conjuration): Cannot learn or cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Illusion): Cannot learn or cast Illusion spells
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
Spell Penetration: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance

Companions
Familiar: Owl "Pivekkeskisondofu"

Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
